title: If I Helped My Older Brother With Darkness, I Will Lose My Magical Power and Will Be Removed From the List of Crown Prince’s Candidate - Novel Updates
tags: Brother Complex   Demon Lord   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Elemental Magic   Fallen Nobility   Fantasy World   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Manipulative Characters   Mpreg   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Possessive Characters   R-18   Reincarnation   Royalty   Shota   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Weak Protagonist   Younger Brothers   Younger Love Interests
author: Kujuzawa Mahoro   Kuzuryuuzaka Mahoron   Mahoron   Tsukumosawa Mahoro   まほろん   九十九沢まほろ   九頭竜坂まほろん
description:
To save my elder brother, I gave up all of my light elemental powers. When my father (His Majesty) knew I lost my powers, I was stripped of my status as a prince and sent away to a Marquisate. [I was able to save my brother so I don’t mind].

But why did my brother, who came along with me to the Marquisate, say “I want to sleep in the same bed”, does he miss the company of others?>
